</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"MS Mincho",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:

18.0pt;font-family:SimSun;mso-bidi-font-family:SimSun;background:yellow;

background:yellow;mso-highlight:yellow;mso-font-kerning:0pt">行的，那它的运行效率肯定没有</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:SimSun;mso-bidi-font-family:SimSun;
